cli_content:
(10.1.1.0, 224.1.1.1), RPF nbr: 192.168.1.1
  Incoming interface: GigabitEthernet0/1, RPF nbr: 192.168.1.1
  Outgoing interface list:
    GigabitEthernet0/3, forwarded
    GigabitEthernet0/2, pruned

(10.1.2.0, 224.2.2.2), RPF nbr: 192.168.2.1
  Incoming interface: GigabitEthernet0/2, RPF nbr: 192.168.2.1
  Outgoing interface list:
    GigabitEthernet0/4, forwarded
    GigabitEthernet0/5, pruned
textfsm_template:
Value SOURCE_ADDR (\S+)
Value MULTICAST_GROUP (\S+)
Value RPF_NBR (\S+)
Value INCOMING_INTERFACE (\S+)
Value OUTGOING_INTERFACE (\S+)
Value INTERFACE_STATUS (\S+)

Start
  ^\(${SOURCE_ADDR},\s+${MULTICAST_GROUP}\),\s+RPF nbr:\s+${RPF_NBR}\s*$$
  ^\s+Incoming interface:\s+${INCOMING_INTERFACE},\s+RPF nbr:\s+\S+\s*$$
  ^\s+Outgoing interface list:\s*$$
  ^\s+${OUTGOING_INTERFACE},\s+${INTERFACE_STATUS}\s*$$ -> Record
